data.description:
Overview


Keysight is at the forefront of technology innovation, delivering breakthroughs and trusted insights in electronic design, simulation, prototyping, test, manufacturing, and optimization. Our ~15,000 employees create world-class solutions in communications, 5G, automotive, energy, quantum, aerospace, defense, and semiconductor markets for customers in over 100 countries. Learn more about what we do.

 

Our award-winning culture embraces a bold vision of where technology can take us and a passion for tackling challenging problems with industry-first solutions. We believe that when people feel a sense of belonging, they can be more creative, innovative, and thrive at all points in their careers.


Responsibilities


In this role, you will work with a development team exploring data center hardware and connectivity technologies. Your assignment will support this team by creating an application to manage lab hardware configuration and allocation.

 

This position starts in January 2026 and continues through May 2026. 


Qualifications


Current student pursuing a BS degree in computer science, computer engineering or another equivalent engineering discipline.

 

 

We're looking for candidates interested in communication technologies and application design with the following skills:

  • Full-stack development capability
  • Knowledge of GUI technologies such as Angular
  • Knowledge of software programming languages such as golang or C++
  • Knowledge of database development
  • Excellent communication skills
  • Ability to function effectively in a remote team environment
  • Ability to quickly learn new technologies

Candidates who wish to be considered must be currently enrolled in an accredited college/university as of September 2026. Applicants who have graduated before September 2026 will not be considered unless they are starting a MS or PHD program after graduating.

 
Colorado Pay Range: $30.34-32.68 per hour
 
Based on experience, education and skills, most offers will be between the minimum and the midpoint of the Salary Range listed above.
 
Note: For other locations, pay ranges will vary by region.

 

Careers Privacy Statement***Keysight is an Equal Opportunity Employer.***
